column4: Hello, anyone know why my cpu uses 100% resources to play back flash video online and only uses 38% to play a 720p xvid off of a dvd??
it is a amd athlon 64 754 socket 3200+
any known flash players for firefox that will be smoother and use less resources?
don't want to upgrade computer just for FLASH :(
I hardly ever go to youtube
I watch streaming tv stations that use flash. I got it going pretty smooth at 100% resources
HaC|away if you use firefox you can try flahsvideoreplacer addon to play it with your native player
Is there an alternative SWF file player to default to in Firefox??
thanks I will give it a try....I don't think VLC handles that....but will try both   thanks
anyone know the easy way to install swfdec-0.8.4 tar.gz from desktop?
how about install it from software centre, you can't have more than 1 plugin for flash installed at once
Doesn't seem to be in software sources
I take that back....its in package manager...thanks
